| HistoryText             = 
[[Bran Bardic (Earth-70518)|Albion]] traveled the multiverse killing other versions of Captain Britain, collecting their Swords of Might and Amulets of Right.  He used these Swords and Amulets to power the Shadow Captains, all of whom were searching to regain superpowers since they were all de-powered mutants.{{Citation}}
